settings.about_us_paragraph: With a rich legacy of over 8 years, GARI PARTS has steadily evolved into Pakistan's premier choice for auto parts, lubricants, and vehicle maintenance services.Â  Founded by visionary brothers, Irfan and Faizan, our journey that began in Karachi has transformed into a driving force in the industry.

At GARI PARTS , we are more than a business; we are a driving passion for seamless and dependable transportation, regardless of your vehicle - be it a car, motorcycle, or truck. Our primary mission is to offer top-quality vehicle parts, premium lubricant engine oils complemented by exceptional auto maintenance services. We strive to be your trusted destination for all your automotive needs, with a comprehensive range of products and services to enhance your vehicle's performance and longevity.

Customer Service : At GARI PARTS, customer satisfaction is not just a goal; it's our core value.

Our dedicated staff excels in both service and knowledge, ensuring your experience is nothing less than exceptional.

Quality of Service:
We take pride in delivering high-quality services with remarkable speed. We utilize only the finest products to ensure your vehicle receives the best care available.

Price: Affordability
without compromise - that's our commitment. We offer competitive pricing to make top-notch automotive services and parts accessible to all.

We're more than an auto service provider; we're your partners in car care. Our skilled auto mechanics and staff are dedicated to providing top-tier car maintenance and repair services. Count on our in-depth knowledge and expertise to keep your vehicle in its prime time. As your go-to auto parts shop, we've got you covered. Our extensive inventory boasts a wide selection of car parts including car filters, brake pads, spark plugs as well as comprehensive range of vehicle lubricants to meet your every need.

Quality is our hallmark. Our team of automotive mechanics is unwavering in their commitment to deliver high-quality services and products. Whether it's an oilchangeservice,maintenance, or any other automotive service, our skilled professionals are dedicated to meeting your requirements. At GARI PARTS, it's not just aboutauto care; it's about ensuring that every ride you take is smooth andsatisfying.Your vehicle, ourcommitment.

1. Vehicle Lubricants: We provide a range of high-quality lubricant engine oils that help ensure optimal performance and protection for your vehicle's engine.
  2. Car Filters: We offer a variety of filters for cars, including air filters, oil filters, and fuel filters. These filters play a crucial role in maintaining the cleanliness and efficiency of your vehicle's systems.
  3. Brake Pads: Our selection of top-notch brake pads ensures reliable braking performance, promoting safety on the road.

settings.about_us_text: Our mission is to seamlessly blend quality and affordability, offering an extensive range of car and bike parts and accessories that set industry standards. Beyond transactions, we aim to forge lasting customer relationships, underlining our dedication to not only meet but exceed expectations with every interaction.
